name: rewet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make something wet again: Once dry, the gel can be rewetted and used for several years. Samples were weighed before being re-wetted as described above. Related word
wet verb
More examplesFewer examplesFor glazing, rewet the paper with a brush, making quick, light marks of colour.As well as being a precious resource, peat is difficult to re-wet once dry.It takes a lot of energy to grow the crop, dry, transport, re-wet, ferment, distil and distribute it.
